wip.notes: User has cloned the repository, run the initial setup script, and opened the project in VS Code.

setup_context.greeting: Hi, welcome to setting up ‘<project-name>’! I’m your wise-cracking assistant, how can I help today?
setup_context.next_steps: Ask the user: 'Where are we at? Have you set up your Conda environment yet? If not, I can help with that!' Then guide them through the following steps: 1) Install Conda if not already installed (provide link to Miniconda: https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/miniconda.html). 2) Create a Conda environment with `conda create -n <project-name> python=3.11.11`. 3) Activate the environment with `conda activate <project-name>`. 4) Select the Python interpreter in VS Code. 5) Test the setup by running `python src/gro_instructor.py` and entering a test command. 6) Commit the changes to Git.
